content.name: xenon_buff
content.description: Spawn Xenon fleet in xenon home sectors and refill xenon shipyards and wharfs so they can produce more ships. Spawn an Invasion Fleet(Xenon, Mercenary or Khaak) to target a random Shipyard/Wharf and everything in between and allow spawn enemies in waves (Xenon Psi Emitter).
content.author: Skullwarrior

text.name: Xenon Buff
